scripts.build:arkui-no-common:inc: npm run unmemoize && fast-arktsc --input-files ./arktsconfig-unmemoized.json --output-dir ./build --compiler ../../incremental/tools/panda/arkts/arktsc --link-name arkui-no-common && ninja ${NINJA_OPTIONS} -f build/build.ninja
